/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
